channel.title: TFS on Joost's blog
channel.description: Recent content in TFS on Joost's blog

item.title: How to run SPCAF v5 analysis during TeamBuild in TFS 2013
item.description: This how-to is based on the SPCAF how-to written for TFS 2012. If you are looking how to run SPCAF v4 during TeamBuild in TFS 2013, see this post.

item.title: How to run SPCAF v4 analysis during TeamBuild in TFS 2013
item.description: Update October 15, 2014: This post is based on SPCAF version 4.*, and is updated to include the TFS Build Activity changes in SPCAF version 4.

item.title: Track bugs as backlog items
item.description: When you are using the CMMI project template in TFS 2012 and use the Backlog to track your Work Items there are scenarios where you want to see Bugs in your Backlog.
